page.title: 09RANSKILL GUIDES
page.content: In Ranskill there is a building called "The Church Room".We have guides there every Tuesday evening.Guides starts at six o'clock and ends at eight o'clock.We all split up into groups,these are called patrols.I am in the patrol "Forget Me Not".The other patrols are Blue Bell, White Heather and Red Rose.We do all sorts of things including,quizes and treasure hunts.It costs 20p for subs which pays for trips that we go on (like hiking and other activities.)This week we are making models out of soap.We do badges like collectors,we have to collect something, then put them on display.Guides is run by two ladies,but one of them is leaving soon.
